name: Students Help at Animal Shelter, Gain Work Experience
description: A program for high school students with disabilities prepares them for the workforce and is also helping exercise and socialize shelter animals, so that they are more likely to be adopted.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Reading Time:  < 1 minuteA program for high school students with disabilities prepares them for the workforce and is also helping exercise and socialize shelter animals, so that they are more likely to be adopted.
